description: Stage data from a directory into an S3 bucket

inputPortDescriptors.description: AWS Access Key ID that is authorized to push to the s3 location specified in 'directory'.
inputPortDescriptors.name: access_key_id

inputPortDescriptors.description: AWS Session Token.  Only required as part of temporary credentials.
inputPortDescriptors.name: session_token

inputPortDescriptors.description: full S3 URL where the data will be written.
inputPortDescriptors.name: destination

name: SaveToS3
